DOC.brief_summary: The aim study determine whether plasma sclerostin level affect sex hormone menstrual cycle . Blood sample obtain begin ( 2-5th day ) , mid ( 11-13th day ) end ( 21-23th day ) menstrual cycle . Serum sclerostin , estradiol , progesterone testosteron level measure blindly one investigator
DOC.detailed_description: This study prospective , observational , single-center study . Ethical approval obtain Institutional Review Board . This study complete 40 premenopausal healthy volunteer woman . An intravenous cannula insert antecubital vein . Blood sample obtain begin ( 2-5th day ) , mid ( 11-13th day ) end ( 21-23th day ) menstrual cycle . Serum collect centrifuge 15 minute 1000Xg within 30 minute collection . Aliquots plasma add Ependorf tube store -20°C . Plasma sclerostin level measure use Human Sclerostin ELISA kit ( Cusabio , Catalog No : CSB-E13146h , Newark , DE , USA ) . All assay perform accord manufacturer 's instruction . The minimum detectable concentration human sclerostin typically < 0.012 ng/ml . Intra-assay precision less 8 % . Estradiol progesterone level analyze serum sample use electrochemiluminescence immunoassay ( Elecsys PTH , Elecsys-estradiol II ; Roche Diagnostics , Mannheim , Germany ) Cobas 601 analyze system ( Roche Diagnostics ) . Free testosteron level analyze serum sample use RIA ( radio immun assay ) ( DSL 4900 Testosterone , Free , Active® RIA Assay kit , Beckman Coulter ) DSL 4900 Berthold Technologies Multi Crystal LB 2111 model gama counter .
DOC.criteria: premenopausal woman healthy volunteer Endocrinopathies Bone disease ( osteoporosis , osteomalacia , paget disease etc ) Women use hormonal drug within last six month Cognitive disorder
